cities.name: Gothenburg

interests.name: Liseberg Amusement Park

interests.description: A car-free island group offering fishing villages, cliffs, and coastal hiking just a short ferry ride away.

cities.local_food_tip: Try fresh seafood like shrimp sandwiches (r√§kmacka), herring, fish soup, cinnamon buns, and locally roasted coffee.

cities.name: Stockholm

interests.name: Gamla Stan (Old Town)
interests.description: A beautifully preserved medieval old town with narrow cobbled streets, colorful houses, and historic squares.

interests.name: Vasa Museum
interests.description: One of Scandinavia‚Äôs most visited museums, housing the 17th-century warship Vasa, remarkably preserved.

interests.description: An iconic red-brick building on the waterfront, famous for the Nobel Prize banquet and its tower views.

cities.name: Uppsala

interests.name: Uppsala Cathedral (Domkyrkan)
interests.description: The largest cathedral in Scandinavia, a Gothic masterpiece and burial place of Swedish kings and scholars.

interests.name: Uppsala University
interests.description: Founded in 1477, Sweden‚Äôs oldest university, giving the city its strong academic and youthful atmosphere.

interests.name: Gustavianum Museum
interests.description: A university museum featuring Viking artifacts, academic history, and the famous anatomical theatre.

cities.local_food_tip: Try Swedish classics like meatballs, salmon dishes, pea soup with pancakes, cinnamon buns, and fika-style coffee breaks.

spring.description: Uppsala‚Äôs biggest celebration with student traditions, river rafting, and outdoor festivities.

summer.description: Long daylight hours and calm streets after the academic year.

autumn.description: Students return, bringing energy back to the city.

winter.description: Snowy streets and festive lights create a cozy atmosphere.

public_transport_tips.tip: Trains connect Uppsala with Stockholm in about 40 minutes.
Local buses efficiently cover the city.
Uppsala is compact and ideal for walking or cycling.

city_events.name: Valborg (Walpurgis Night)
city_events.description: Major student celebration with traditions unique to Uppsala.
